sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function () { const baseprompt = "Generate cover letter for a React Software Engineer position at Sorenson Communications. The name of the applicant is Hector Magana, they are from Salt Lake City, Utah. The applicant education is a Bachelor Degree in Software Engineering at Snow College. Experience includes STEM leadership positions in College during spring 2021 and a Web Development Internship at Snow College Marketing Department during fall 2021. Letter is addressed to Sorenson Engineering Hiring Committee. Candidate is skilled in web development, React.js, API development, C#, AWS and Azure Cloud Services. Candidate is excited and passionate to apply for the position and is confident that their skill set will bring value to the company." return (
Tell us about yourself
) }
